LocationPicker.geolocationNotSupported: Mprempren browser no ntumi mmoa geolocation acquisition .
LocationPicker.getLocationFailed: Woantumi annye beae no, yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ kwan nhyehyɛe no .
LocationPicker.getCurrentLocation: Nya beae a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no .
LocationPicker.title: Beae din .
LocationPicker.descriptionPlaceholder: Yɛsrɛ sɛ kyerɛw nkyerɛkyerɛmu a ɛkɔ akyiri (wopɛ) .
LocationPicker.preview: Beae a ɛwɔ hɔ no ho nhwɛso .
LocationPicker.permissionPrompt: Ɛsɛ sɛ yenya wo beae ho nsɛm na yɛde nnwuma a eye kyɛn so ama, so wɔma ho kwan?
LocationPicker.permissionDenied: Positioning ho kwan a wɔpow, yɛsrɛ wo ma positioning ho kwan nyɛ adwuma wɔ wo browser nhyehyɛe mu .
LocationPicker.locationTimeout: Fa positioning timeout si hɔ, hwɛ hu sɛ woadan afiri no na bɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛsan anya .
LocationPicker.locationUnavailable: Worentumi nnya beae a wowɔ mprempren no, yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ Device Location Service .
